item.title: I viewed a $600K house, but discovered that the kitchen is ‘unsafe’ and has no foundation. Do I have a moral obligation to tell the seller’s agent?
Here’s the level that could be an attractive entry point for stocks, says Morgan Stanley’s Mike Wilson
item.description: A Morgan Stanley analyst identifies the point where investors might find an attractive entry point to get back in the market.

item.title: Lebron James: A career for the history books and a $70 million property portfolio
item.description: The first player to score 50,000 combined points in the NBA, LeBron James is a power player in real estate, too.

item.title: Diddy temporarily de-lists $61.5 million Beverly Hills mansion; he remains in jail
item.description: The 10-bedroom, 13-bath Holmby Hills property is back on the market, for the same price as the rapper awaits trial.

item.title: Treasury yields slip as U.S. recession talk lingers
item.description: Bond yields fell early Monday after U.S. President Donald Trump did not rule out the possibility that his policies would cause a recession
